meta.content: Profiles, statistics and reviews of over 100,000 public schools in the USA. Help with finding the right school.

a.title: The Link Between Education and Incarceration: The NAACP Report

img.title: The Link Between Education and Incarceration: The NAACP Report

div.a: The Link Between Education and Incarceration: The NAACP Report

div.div: Education and the rate of incarceration have been linked in a recent NAACP report. Learn about the report and the troubling findings.

a.title: Tips to Maintain Your Child’s Education During School Closures

img.alt: Tips to Maintain Your Child’s Education During School Closures
img.title: Tips to Maintain Your Child’s Education During School Closures

div.a: Tips to Maintain Your Child’s Education During School Closures

div.div: Schools all over the country have closed their doors to slow the spread of COVID-19, forcing educators and parents to switch to online learning strategies. Read on to learn where to start with homeschooling and for helpful resources for learning at home.

a.title: The Impact of Coronavirus on Public Schools

img.alt: The Impact of Coronavirus on Public Schools
img.title: The Impact of Coronavirus on Public Schools

div.a: The Impact of Coronavirus on Public Schools

div.div: As schools around the country close for two weeks or more, parents find themselves asking some tough questions. Read on to learn about the current and future impact of COVID-19 on students in public schools.
